casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. HOWARD
v.
TURNER 2018-0824 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 5, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellees' motion to strike. Motion denied. Appellees are ordered to file their merit brief within 15 days. Appellant is ordered to serve on appellees a complete and accurate copy of the brief that was filed in this case within ten days.
